trans-unit.source: to use: R2017b specifies the traditional (separate complex) C API, and corresponds to the -R2017b flag for the mex command. R2018a specifies the new interleaved complex C API, and corresponds to the -R2018a flag for the mex command. Ignored if MATLAB version prior to R2018a. Defaults to R2017b.
trans-unit.target: 使用： R2017b 指定传统的（分离的复杂）C API，并且对应于 mex 命令的 -R2017b 标志。 R2018a 指定新的交错复杂C API，并且对应于 mex 命令的 -R2018a 标志。是否忽略R2018a之前的MATLAB版本。默认为 R2017b 。

trans-unit.source: where
where <checkState> must be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 其中 <checkState> 必须为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: where <cmake> is the location of the cmake(1) command-line tool, and <config> and <target> are the values provided to the CONFIGURATION and TARGET options, if any. The trailing -- -i option is added for Makefile Generators if policy CMP0061 is not set to NEW.
trans-unit.target: 其中， <cmake> 是 cmake(1) 命令行工具的位置，而 <config> 和 <target> 是提供给 CONFIGURATION 和 TARGET 选项（如果有）的值。如果策略 CMP0061 未设置为 NEW ,则为Makefile Generators添加尾随 -- -i 选项。

trans-unit.source: where <dir> is one of:

where <items> is a list of items that are separated by semicolon or whitespace. All commands between foreach and the matching endforeach are recorded without being invoked. Once the endforeach is evaluated, the recorded list of commands is invoked once for each item in <items>. At the beginning of each iteration the variable loop_var will be set to the value of the current item.
trans-unit.target: 其中 <items> 是由分号或空格分隔的项目列表。 foreach 和匹配的 endforeach 之间的所有命令都将被记录而不被调用。一旦对 endforeach 进行了评估，将为 <items> 中的每个项目调用一次记录的命令列表。在每次迭代的开始，变量 loop_var 将被设置为当前项的值。

trans-unit.source: where <kind> is one of the Object Kinds, -v is literal, and <major> is the major version number.
trans-unit.target: 其中 <kind> 是对象种类之一， -v 是文字，而 <major> 是主要版本号。

trans-unit.source: where <lang> is a language that may be passed to enable_language() such as Fortran. If CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER is already defined the check does nothing. Otherwise it tries enabling the language in a test project. The result is cached in CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER as the compiler that was found, or NOTFOUND if the language cannot be enabled. For CUDA which can have an explicit host compiler, the cache CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER variable will be set if it was required for compilation (and cleared if it was not).
trans-unit.target: where <lang> is a language that may be passed to enable_language() such as Fortran . If CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER is already defined the check does nothing. Otherwise it tries enabling the language in a test project. The result is cached in CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER as the compiler that was found, or NOTFOUND if the language cannot be enabled. For CUDA which can have an explicit host compiler, the cache CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER variable will be set if it was required for compilation (and cleared if it was not).

trans-unit.source: where <lang> is a language that may be passed to enable_language() such as Fortran. If CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER is already defined the check does nothing. Otherwise it tries enabling the language in a test project. The result is cached in CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER as the compiler that was found, or NOTFOUND if the language cannot be enabled. For CUDA which can have an explicit host compiler, the cache CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER variable will be set if it was required for compilation.
trans-unit.target: 其中 <lang> 是可以传递给 enable_language() 的语言，例如 Fortran 。如果已经定义了 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER ,则检查不执行任何操作。否则，它将尝试在测试项目中启用该语言。结果作为找到的编译器缓存在 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER 中；如果无法启用该语言，则缓存为 NOTFOUND 。对于可以具有显式主机编译器的CUDA，如果需要编译缓存， CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER 设置缓存CMAKE_CUDA_HOST_COMPILER变量。

trans-unit.source: where <major>.<minor> is the version of CMake you want to support (such as 3.14). The command will ensure that at least the given version of CMake is running and help newer versions be compatible with the project. See documentation of cmake_minimum_required() for details.
trans-unit.target: 其中 <major>.<minor> 是您要支持的CMake的版本（例如 3.14 ）。该命令将确保至少正在运行给定版本的CMake，并帮助较新版本与项目兼容。有关详细信息，请参见 cmake_minimum_required() 的文档。

trans-unit.source: where <setting> is the setting name and <value> is the setting value.
trans-unit.target: 其中 <setting> 是设置名称，而 <value> 是设置值。

trans-unit.source: where <source_dir> is the directory of the C++ file and AUTOUIC_SEARCH_PATHS is a list of additional search paths.
trans-unit.target: 其中， <source_dir> 是C ++文件的目录，而 AUTOUIC_SEARCH_PATHS 是其他搜索路径的列表。

trans-unit.source: where B is meant to find /path/to/libB.so. This code is wrong because the user is asking the linker to find library B but has not provided a linker search path (which may be added with the link_directories command). However, with the old linking implementation the code would work accidentally because the linker search path added for library A allowed library B to be found.
trans-unit.target: 其中 B 旨在找到 /path/to/libB.so 。此代码是错误的，因为用户正在要求链接器查找库B，但未提供链接器搜索路径（可以通过link_directories命令添加）。但是，使用旧的链接实现，由于为库A添加的链接器搜索路径允许找到库B，因此该代码将意外工作。

trans-unit.source: where EXECUTABLE is the MPI program, and ARGS are the arguments to pass to the MPI program.
trans-unit.target: 其中 EXECUTABLE 是MPI程序，而 ARGS 是要传递给MPI程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: where Foo* is a case-insensitive globbing expression. In our example the globbing expression will match <prefix>/lib/cmake/foo-1.2 and the package configuration file will be found.
trans-unit.target: 其中 Foo* 是不区分大小写的全局表达式。在我们的示例中，通配表达式将匹配 <prefix>/lib/cmake/foo-1.2 并将找到程序包配置文件。

trans-unit.source: where client- is literal, <client> is a string uniquely identifying the client, <kind> is one of the Object Kinds, -v is literal, and <major> is the major version number. Each client must choose a unique <client> identifier via its own means.
trans-unit.target: 其中 client- 是文字， <client> 是唯一标识客户端的字符串， <kind> 是Object Kinds之一， -v 是文字，而 <major> 是主要版本号。每个客户端必须通过自己的方式选择唯一的 <client> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: where client- is literal, <client> is a string uniquely identifying the client, and query.json is literal. Each client must choose a unique <client> identifier via its own means.
trans-unit.target: 其中 client- 是文字， <client> 是唯一标识客户端的字符串，而 query.json 是文字。每个客户端必须通过自己的方式选择唯一的 <client> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: where compiler_ids is a comma-separated list. 1 if the CMake’s compiler id of the C compiler matches any one of the entries in compiler_ids, otherwise 0. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable.
trans-unit.target: 其中 compiler_ids 是逗号分隔的列表。 1 ，如果CMake的的C编译器的编译器ID匹配中的条目中的任何一个 compiler_ids ，否则 0 。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量。

trans-unit.source: where compiler_ids is a comma-separated list. 1 if the CMake’s compiler id of the CUDA compiler matches any one of the entries in compiler_ids, otherwise 0. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable.
trans-unit.target: 其中 compiler_ids 是逗号分隔的列表。 1 ，如果CMake的年代CUDA编译器编译器ID匹配的条目中的任何一个 compiler_ids ，否则 0 。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量。

trans-unit.source: where compiler_ids is a comma-separated list. 1 if the CMake’s compiler id of the CXX compiler matches any one of the entries in compiler_ids, otherwise 0. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable.
trans-unit.target: 其中 compiler_ids 是逗号分隔的列表。 1 ，如果CMake的年代CXX编译器编译器ID匹配的条目中的任何一个 compiler_ids ，否则 0 。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量。

trans-unit.source: where compiler_ids is a comma-separated list. 1 if the CMake’s compiler id of the Fortran compiler matches any one of the entries in compiler_ids, otherwise 0. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable.
trans-unit.target: 其中 compiler_ids 是逗号分隔的列表。 1 ，如果CMake的的Fortran编译器编译器ID匹配的条目中的任何一个 compiler_ids ，否则 0 。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量。

trans-unit.source: where compiler_ids is a comma-separated list. 1 if the CMake’s compiler id of the ISPC compiler matches any one of the entries in compiler_ids, otherwise 0. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable.
trans-unit.target: 其中 compiler_ids 是逗号分隔的列表。 1 ，如果CMake的年代ISPC编译器编译器ID匹配的条目中的任何一个 compiler_ids ，否则 0 。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量。

trans-unit.source: where compiler_ids is a comma-separated list. 1 if the CMake’s compiler id of the Objective-C compiler matches any one of the entries in compiler_ids, otherwise 0. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable.
trans-unit.target: 其中 compiler_ids 是逗号分隔的列表。 1 ，如果CMake的的Objective-C的编译器的编译器ID匹配中的条目中的任何一个 compiler_ids ，否则 0 。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量。

trans-unit.source: where compiler_ids is a comma-separated list. 1 if the CMake’s compiler id of the Objective-C++ compiler matches any one of the entries in compiler_ids, otherwise 0. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable.
trans-unit.target: 其中 compiler_ids 是逗号分隔的列表。 1 ，如果CMake的的客观-C ++编译器的编译器ID匹配中的条目中的任何一个 compiler_ids 否则， 0 。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量。

trans-unit.source: where conditions is a comma-separated list of boolean expressions. Evaluates to 1 if all conditions are 1. Otherwise evaluates to 0.
trans-unit.target: 其中 conditions 是一个用逗号分隔的布尔表达式列表。计算结果为 1 ，如果各方面条件都 1 。否则求值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: where conditions is a comma-separated list of boolean expressions. Evaluates to 1 if at least one of the conditions is 1. Otherwise evaluates to 0.
trans-unit.target: 其中 conditions 是一个用逗号分隔的布尔表达式列表。计算结果为 1 ，如果的条件中的至少一个是 1 。否则求值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: where features is a comma-spearated list. Evaluates to 1 if all of the features are available for the ‘head’ target, and 0 otherwise. If this expression is used while evaluating the link implementation of a target and if any dependency transitively increases the required C_STANDARD or CXX_STANDARD for the ‘head’ target, an error is reported. See the cmake-compile-features(7) manual for information on compile features and a list of supported compilers.
trans-unit.target: 其中 features 是逗号分隔的列表。如果所有 features 均可用于“ head”目标，则求值为 1 ，否则为 0 。如果在评估目标的链接实现时使用了此表达式，并且如果任何依赖关系可传递地增加了“ head”目标所需的 C_STANDARD 或 CXX_STANDARD ，则将报告错误。有关 cmake-compile-features(7) 的信息和支持的编译器列表，请参见cmake-compile-features（7）手册。

trans-unit.source: where index- is literal and <unspecified> is an unspecified name selected by CMake. Whenever a new index file is generated it is given a new name and any old one is deleted. During the short time between these steps there may be multiple index files present; the one with the largest name in lexicographic order is the current index file.
trans-unit.target: 其中 index- 是文字，而 <unspecified> 是CMake选择的未指定名称。每当生成一个新的索引文件时，它都会被赋予一个新名称，而所有旧文件都将被删除。在这些步骤之间的短暂时间内，可能存在多个索引文件；按字典顺序名称最大的一个是当前索引文件。

trans-unit.source: where lib<name>.so.1 is the soname of the library and lib<name>.so is a “namelink” allowing linkers to find the library when given -l<name>. The NAMELINK_COMPONENT option is similar to the COMPONENT option, but it changes the installation component of a shared library namelink if one is generated. If not specified, this defaults to the value of COMPONENT. It is an error to use this parameter outside of a LIBRARY block.
trans-unit.target: 其中 lib<name>.so.1 是库的soname，而 lib<name>.so 是“ namelink”，允许链接器在给定 -l<name> 时查找该库。所述 NAMELINK_COMPONENT 选项类似于 COMPONENT 选项，但是如果产生一个它改变的共享库namelink的安装组件。如果未指定，则默认为 COMPONENT 的值。在 LIBRARY 块之外使用此参数是错误的。

trans-unit.source: where platform_ids is a comma-separated list. 1 if the CMake’s platform id matches any one of the entries in platform_ids, otherwise 0. See also the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable.
trans-unit.target: 其中 platform_ids 是逗号分隔的列表。 1 ，如果CMake的平台ID匹配条目中的任何一个 platform_ids ，否则 0 。另请参阅 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 变量。

trans-unit.source: where somelib is supposed to be a valid library file name such as libsomelib.a or somelib.lib. For Makefile generators this produces an error at build time because the dependency on the full path cannot be found. For Visual Studio Generators IDE and Xcode generators this used to work by accident because CMake would always split off the library directory and ask the linker to search for the library by name (-lsomelib or somelib.lib). Despite the failure with Makefiles, some projects have code like this and build only with Visual Studio and/or Xcode. This version of CMake prefers to pass the full path directly to the native build tool, which will fail in this case because it does not name a valid library file.
trans-unit.target: 其中 somelib 应该是有效的库文件名，例如 libsomelib.a 或 somelib.lib 。对于Makefile生成器，这会在生成时产生错误，因为找不到对完整路径的依赖性。对于Visual Studio生成器 IDE和 Xcode 生成器，这曾经偶然起作用，因为CMake总是会拆分库目录，并要求链接程序按名称搜索库（ -lsomelib 或 somelib.lib ）。尽管Makefile失败，但某些项目仍具有类似的代码，并且仅使用Visual Studio和/或Xcode进行构建。此版本的CMake倾向于将完整路径直接传递给本机生成工具，在这种情况下，它将失败，因为它没有命名有效的库文件。

trans-unit.source: where somelib is supposed to be a valid library file name such as libsomelib.a or somelib.lib. For Makefile generators this produces an error at build time because the dependency on the full path cannot be found. For Visual Studio Generators IDE and Xcode generators this used to work by accident because CMake would always split off the library directory and ask the linker to search for the library by name (-lsomelib or somelib.lib). Despite the failure with Makefiles, some projects have code like this and build only with Visual Studio and/or Xcode. This version of CMake prefers to pass the full path directly to the native build tool, which will fail in this case because it does not name a valid library file.
trans-unit.target: 其中 somelib 应该是有效的库文件名，例如 libsomelib.a 或 somelib.lib 。对于Makefile生成器，由于无法找到对完整路径的依赖关系，因此在生成时会产生错误。对于Visual Studio Generators IDE和 Xcode 生成器，这曾经偶然地起作用，因为CMake总是会拆分出库目录，并要求链接程序按名称搜索库（ -lsomelib 或 somelib.lib ）。尽管Makefile失败，但某些项目仍具有类似的代码，并且仅使用Visual Studio和/或Xcode构建。此版本的CMake倾向于将完整路径直接传递给本机生成工具，在这种情况下，它将失败，因为它没有命名有效的库文件。

trans-unit.source: where the <date> component is of format CCYYMMDD and <id> may contain arbitrary text. This represents development as of a particular date following the <major>.<minor> feature release.
trans-unit.target: 其中 <date> 组件的格式为 CCYYMMDD ,而 <id> 可以包含任意文本。这表示 <major>.<minor> 功能发布之后的特定日期的开发。

trans-unit.source: where:
which adds the required dependency between a scanner and a parser where FlexTarget and BisonTarget are the first parameters of respectively FLEX_TARGET and BISON_TARGET macros.
trans-unit.target: 它在扫描器和解析器之间添加了所需的依赖关系，其中 FlexTarget 和 BisonTarget 分别是 FLEX_TARGET 和 BISON_TARGET 宏的第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: which creates a custom command to generate the FlexOutput file from the FlexInput file. If COMPILE_FLAGS option is specified, the next parameter is added to the flex command line. If flex is configured to output a header file, the DEFINES_FILE option may be used to specify its name. Name is an alias used to get details of this custom command. Indeed the macro defines the following variables:
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个自定义命令生成 FlexOutput 从文件 FlexInput 文件。如果指定了 COMPILE_FLAGS 选项，则将下一个参数添加到flex命令行。如果将flex配置为输出头文件，则可以使用 DEFINES_FILE 选项指定其名称。名称是用于获取此自定义命令的详细信息的别名。实际上，宏定义了以下变量：

trans-unit.source: which enables compatibility features for CMake 2.4 and lower.
trans-unit.target: 它使CMake 2.4及以下版本的兼容功能得以实现。

trans-unit.source: which is added to the target’s sources.
trans-unit.target: 它被添加到目标的源中。

trans-unit.source: which is true because var2 is defined to var1 which is not a false constant.
trans-unit.target: 这是正确的，因为将 var2 定义为 var1 ，这不是一个假常量。

trans-unit.source: which more accurately matches what the project specified.
trans-unit.target: 更准确地匹配项目指定的内容。

trans-unit.source: which sets CMake policies based on the range of versions specified. When a <min> version 2.4 or lower is given the command implicitly invokes
trans-unit.target: 它根据指定的版本范围设置CMake策略。当给出 <min> 2.4或更低版本时，该命令会隐式调用

trans-unit.source: which will allow library B to be found as it was previously. When this policy is set to NEW, CMake will produce a link line such as
trans-unit.target: 这将允许库B像以前一样被找到。当这个策略被设置为NEW时,CMake将产生一个链接行,如

trans-unit.source: which will create a custom rule to generate a parser. <YaccInput> is the path to a yacc file. <CodeOutput> is the name of the source file generated by bison. A header file is also be generated, and contains the token list.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个自定义规则以生成解析器。 <YaccInput> 是yacc文件的路径。 <CodeOutput> 是bison生成的源文件的名称。头文件也将生成，并包含令牌列表。

trans-unit.source: which will install the concerned software using the installation prefix, e.g. /usr/local prepended with the DESTDIR value which finally gives /home/john/usr/local.
trans-unit.target: 它将使用安装前缀来安装相关软件，例如 /usr/local 加上 DESTDIR 值，最终给出 /home/john/usr/local 。

trans-unit.source: which will install the concerned software using the installation prefix, e.g. /usr/local prepended with the DESTDIR value which finally gives /home/john/usr/local. When preparing a package, CPack first installs the items to be packaged in a local (to the build tree) directory by using the same DESTDIR mechanism. Nevertheless, if CPACK_SET_DESTDIR is set then CPack will set DESTDIR before doing the local install. The most noticeable difference is that without CPACK_SET_DESTDIR, CPack uses CPACK_PACKAGING_INSTALL_PREFIX as a prefix whereas with CPACK_SET_DESTDIR set, CPack will use CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX as a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 它将使用安装前缀来安装相关软件，例如 /usr/local 加上 DESTDIR 值，最终给出 /home/john/usr/local 。在准备软件包时，CPack首先使用相同的 DESTDIR 机制将要打包的项目安装在本地（到构建树）目录中。然而，如果 CPACK_SET_DESTDIR 设置，那么CPack将设置 DESTDIR 做本地安装之前。最明显的区别是，如果没有 CPACK_SET_DESTDIR ，CPack将使用 CPACK_PACKAGING_INSTALL_PREFIX 作为前缀，而在设置了 CPACK_SET_DESTDIR 的情况下，CPack将使用 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 作为前缀。

trans-unit.target: 这将导致响应类型为“ reply”：

trans-unit.source: will be set to the full path of the module that was loaded. Otherwise the variable will not be set.
trans-unit.target: 将被设置为被加载的模块的完整路径。否则这个变量将不会被设置。

trans-unit.source: will convert lines of the form
will extract and install header files from a source tree.
trans-unit.target: 将从源树中提取并安装头文件。

trans-unit.source: will include objlib’s object files in a library and an executable along with those compiled from their own sources. Object libraries may contain only sources that compile, header files, and other files that would not affect linking of a normal library (e.g. .txt). They may contain custom commands generating such sources, but not PRE_BUILD, PRE_LINK, or POST_BUILD commands. Some native build systems (such as Xcode) may not like targets that have only object files, so consider adding at least one real source file to any target that references $<TARGET_OBJECTS:objlib>.
trans-unit.target: 将在库中包含objlib的目标文件和一个可执行文件，以及从其自身源编译的文件。对象库可能只包含编译源，头文件和其他不会影响普通库链接的文件（例如 .txt ）。它们可能包含生成此类源的自定义命令，但不 PRE_BUILD ， PRE_LINK 或 POST_BUILD 命令。某些本机生成系统（例如Xcode）可能不喜欢仅具有目标文件的目标，因此请考虑向至少一个引用 $<TARGET_OBJECTS:objlib> 目标添加至少一个真实的源文件。

trans-unit.source: will install myExe to <prefix>/bin and myStaticLib to <prefix>/lib/static. On non-DLL platforms mySharedLib will be installed to <prefix>/lib and /some/full/path. On DLL platforms the mySharedLib DLL will be installed to <prefix>/bin and /some/full/path and its import library will be installed to <prefix>/lib/static and /some/full/path.
trans-unit.target: 将 myExe 安装到 <prefix>/bin 并将 myStaticLib 安装到 <prefix>/lib/static 。在非DLL平台上， mySharedLib 将安装到 <prefix>/lib 和 /some/full/path 。在DLL平台上， mySharedLib DLL将安装到 <prefix>/bin 和 /some/full/path ，其导入库将安装到 <prefix>/lib/static 和 /some/full/path 。

trans-unit.source: will install the icons directory to share/myproj/icons and the scripts directory to share/myproj. The icons will get default file permissions, the scripts will be given specific permissions, and any CVS directories will be excluded.
trans-unit.target: 将安装 icons 目录到 share/myproj/icons 和 scripts 目录到 share/myproj 。图标将获得默认的文件许可权，将为脚本赋予特定的许可权，并且将排除所有 CVS 目录。

trans-unit.source: will install the executable myexe to <prefix>/bin and code to import it in the file <prefix>/lib/myproj/myproj.cmake and <prefix>/share/ndk-modules/Android.mk. An outside project may load this file with the include command and reference the myexe executable from the installation tree using the imported target name mp_myexe as if the target were built in its own tree.
trans-unit.target: 会将可执行文件 myexe 安装到 <prefix>/bin 并将代码导入到文件 <prefix>/lib/myproj/myproj.cmake 和 <prefix>/share/ndk-modules/Android.mk 中。外部项目可以使用include命令加载该文件，并使用导入的目标名称 mp_myexe 从安装树中引用 myexe 可执行文件，就好像目标是在其自己的树中构建的一样。

trans-unit.source: will pass MyInput.mha and MyFrames00.png on the command line but ensure that the associated files are present next to them.
trans-unit.target: 会在命令行上传递 MyInput.mha 和 MyFrames00.png ，但要确保关联的文件位于它们旁边。

trans-unit.source: will print a message during installation.
trans-unit.target: 在安装过程中会打印一条信息。

trans-unit.source: will produce flat structure for iOS systems:
trans-unit.target: 将为iOS系统制作平面结构。

trans-unit.source: will search the registered locations for package configuration files (MyPackageConfig.cmake). The search order among package registry entries for a single package is unspecified and the entry names (hashes in this example) have no meaning. Registered locations may contain package version files (MyPackageConfigVersion.cmake) to tell find_package() whether a specific location is suitable for the version requested.
trans-unit.target: 将在注册位置搜索软件包配置文件（ MyPackageConfig.cmake ）。未指定单个软件包的软件包注册表项之间的搜索顺序，并且条目名称（在此示例中为哈希）没有意义。注册的位置可能包含程序包版本文件（ MyPackageConfigVersion.cmake ），以告知 find_package() 特定位置是否适合所请求的版本。

trans-unit.source: will search the registered locations for package configuration files (MyPackageConfig.cmake). The search order among package registry entries for a single package is unspecified and the entry names (hashes in this example) have no meaning. Registered locations may contain package version files (MyPackageConfigVersion.cmake) to tell find_package() whether a specific location is suitable for the version requested.
trans-unit.target: 将在注册位置搜索软件包配置文件（ MyPackageConfig.cmake ）。未指定单个软件包的软件包注册表条目之间的搜索顺序，并且条目名称（在此示例中为哈希）没有意义。注册的位置可能包含程序包版本文件（ MyPackageConfigVersion.cmake ），以告知 find_package() 特定位置是否适合所请求的版本。

trans-unit.source: will set Key to Value and Key2 to Value2 for all non-built files that use FXCompile.
trans-unit.target: 会为所有使用 FXCompile 的非构建文件将 Key 设置为 Value 并将 Key2 设置为 Value2 。

trans-unit.source: will set Key to Value and Key2 to Value2 on the file.hlsl item as metadata.
trans-unit.target: 将在 file.hlsl 项上将 Key 设置为 Value 并将 Key2 设置为 Value2 作为元数据。

trans-unit.source: will set properties VS_GLOBAL_DefaultLanguage to en-US and VS_GLOBAL_MinimumVisualStudioVersion to 14.0 for all targets (except for INTERFACE libraries).
trans-unit.target: 会将所有目标（ INTERFACE 库除外）的属性 VS_GLOBAL_DefaultLanguage 设置为 en-US ,并将 VS_GLOBAL_MinimumVisualStudioVersion 设置为 14.0 。

trans-unit.source: will work and suppress the warning for this policy. It may also be updated to work with the corrected linking approach:
trans-unit.target: 将起作用,并抑制该政策的警告。也可以更新,以配合修正后的链接方式。

trans-unit.source: with a compiler which does not support -std=gnu++11 or an equivalent flag will not result in an error or warning, but will instead add the -std=gnu++98 flag if supported. This “decay” behavior may be controlled with the CUDA_STANDARD_REQUIRED target property. Additionally, the CUDA_EXTENSIONS target property may be used to control whether compiler-specific extensions are enabled on a per-target basis.
trans-unit.target: 使用不支持 -std=gnu++11 或同等标志的编译器不会导致错误或警告，但会在支持时添加 -std=gnu++98 标志。可以使用 CUDA_STANDARD_REQUIRED 目标属性来控制这种“衰减”行为。此外， CUDA_EXTENSIONS 目标属性可用于控制是否基于每个目标启用特定于编译器的扩展。

trans-unit.source: with a compiler which does not support -std=gnu++11 or an equivalent flag will not result in an error or warning, but will instead add the -std=gnu++98 flag if supported. This “decay” behavior may be controlled with the CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED target property. Additionally, the CXX_EXTENSIONS target property may be used to control whether compiler-specific extensions are enabled on a per-target basis.
trans-unit.target: 使用不支持 -std=gnu++11 或同等标志的编译器不会导致错误或警告，但会在支持时添加 -std=gnu++98 标志。可以使用 CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED 目标属性来控制这种“衰减”行为。此外， CXX_EXTENSIONS 目标属性可用于控制是否基于每个目标启用特定于编译器的扩展。

trans-unit.source: with a compiler which does not support -std=gnu++11 or an equivalent flag will not result in an error or warning, but will instead add the -std=gnu++98 flag if supported. This “decay” behavior may be controlled with the OBJCXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED target property. Additionally, the OBJCXX_EXTENSIONS target property may be used to control whether compiler-specific extensions are enabled on a per-target basis.
trans-unit.target: 使用不支持 -std=gnu++11 或同等标志的编译器不会导致错误或警告，但会在支持时添加 -std=gnu++98 标志。可以使用 OBJCXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED 目标属性来控制这种“衰减”行为。另外， OBJCXX_EXTENSIONS 目标属性可用于控制是否基于每个目标启用特定于编译器的扩展。

trans-unit.source: with a compiler which does not support -std=gnu11 or an equivalent flag will not result in an error or warning, but will instead add the -std=gnu99 or -std=gnu90 flag if supported. This “decay” behavior may be controlled with the C_STANDARD_REQUIRED target property. Additionally, the C_EXTENSIONS target property may be used to control whether compiler-specific extensions are enabled on a per-target basis.
trans-unit.target: 如果编译器不支持 -std=gnu11 或等效标志，则不会导致错误或警告，但会在支持时添加 -std=gnu99 或 -std=gnu90 标志。可以使用 C_STANDARD_REQUIRED 目标属性来控制这种“衰减”行为。此外， C_EXTENSIONS 目标属性可用于控制是否基于每个目标启用特定于编译器的扩展。

trans-unit.source: with a compiler which does not support -std=gnu11 or an equivalent flag will not result in an error or warning, but will instead add the -std=gnu99 or -std=gnu90 flag if supported. This “decay” behavior may be controlled with the OBJC_STANDARD_REQUIRED target property. Additionally, the OBJC_EXTENSIONS target property may be used to control whether compiler-specific extensions are enabled on a per-target basis.
trans-unit.target: 如果编译器不支持 -std=gnu11 或等效标志，则不会导致错误或警告，但会在支持时添加 -std=gnu99 或 -std=gnu90 标志。可以使用 OBJC_STANDARD_REQUIRED 目标属性来控制这种“衰减”行为。此外， OBJC_EXTENSIONS 目标属性可用于控制是否基于每个目标启用特定于编译器的扩展。

trans-unit.source: with a list of build artifacts. The list is sorted with the most important artifacts first (e.g. a .DLL file is listed before a .PDB file on windows).
trans-unit.target: 与构建工件的列表。该列表以最重要的构件为先进行排序(例如,在windows下,.DLL文件被列在.PDB文件之前)。

trans-unit.source: with a list of defines in the form “SOMEVALUE” or “SOMEVALUE=42”. This value is encoded in the system’s native shell format.
trans-unit.target: 定义列表的形式为“ SOMEVALUE”或“ SOMEVALUE = 42”。该值以系统的本机外壳格式编码。

trans-unit.source: with a list of flags to pass to the linker. This value is encoded in the system’s native shell format.
trans-unit.target: 带有要传递给链接器的标志列表。该值以系统的本机外壳格式编码。

trans-unit.source: with a list of include paths. Each include path is an object containing a “path” with the actual include path and “isSystem” with a bool value informing whether this is a normal include or a system include. This value is encoded in the system’s native shell format.
trans-unit.target: 包含包含路径的列表。每个包含路径是一个对象，该对象包含具有实际包含路径的“路径”和具有布尔值的“ isSystem”，该值指示这是正常包含还是系统包含。该值以系统的本机外壳格式编码。

trans-unit.source: with a list of libraries to link to. This value is encoded in the system’s native shell format.
trans-unit.target: 与要链接的库列表。该值以系统的本机外壳格式编码。

trans-unit.source: with a list of source files.
with a string containing all the flags passed to the compiler when building any of the files in this group. This value is encoded in the system’s native shell format.
